dynamic.name: data_folder
dynamic.label: Data folder
dynamic.desc: Folder containing the data (as .xlsx files).

dynamic.name: conc_col
dynamic.label: Concentration column
dynamic.desc: Column number containing the concentration values.

dynamic.name: meas_col
dynamic.label: Measurement column
dynamic.desc: Column number containing the measurement values (e.g. intensities).

dynamic.name: plot_type
dynamic.label: Plot type
dynamic.desc: Type of plot to generate (single plots, a multiplot or a all-in-one plot).

dynamic.name: xlab
dynamic.label: X-axis label
dynamic.desc: Label for x-axis in calibration and response factor plots.

dynamic.name: ylab
dynamic.label: Y-axis label
dynamic.desc: Label for y-axis in calibration.

dynamic.name: show_regression_info
dynamic.label: Show regression info?
dynamic.desc: Show regression information (R2, slope, intercept) in the plot?

dynamic.name: show_linear_range
dynamic.label: Show linear range?
dynamic.desc: Show the linear range of the calibration curve as a rectangle in the plot?

dynamic.name: show_data_points
dynamic.label: Show data points?
dynamic.desc: Show the individual data points (replicates) in the plot?

dynamic.name: point_colour
dynamic.label: Point colour
dynamic.desc: Colour of data points in the calibration plot.

dynamic.name: curve_colour
dynamic.label: Curve colour
dynamic.desc: Colour of the calibration curve in the calibration plot.

dynamic.name: linear_range_colour
dynamic.label: Linear range colour
dynamic.desc: Colour for the linear range rectangle in the calibration plot.

dynamic.name: RF_colour_threshold
dynamic.label: Threshold colour (RF-plot)
dynamic.desc: Colour of the threshold lines in the response factor plot.

dynamic.name: RF_colour_within
dynamic.label: Within range colour (RF-plot)
dynamic.desc: Colour of the response factor points within the threshold range in the response factor plot.

dynamic.name: RF_colour_outside
dynamic.label: Outside range colour (RF-plot)
dynamic.desc: Colour of the response factor points outside of the threshold range in the response factor plot.

dynamic.name: multiplot_nrow
dynamic.label: Multiplot rows
dynamic.desc: Number of rows for multiplot (0 means it will be chosen automatically).

dynamic.name: multiplot_ncol
dynamic.label: Multiplot columns
dynamic.desc: Number of rows for multiplot (0 means it will be chosen automatically).

dynamic.name: multiplot_scales
dynamic.label: Scale option for multiplots
dynamic.desc: fixed: all plots have the same scale, free: each plot has its own scale. free_x and free_y allow free scaling for only x or y axes.

dynamic.name: CC_plot_width
dynamic.label: CalibraCurve plot width
dynamic.desc: Width of CalibraCurve plots in cm. Likely, this has to be increased for multiplots.

dynamic.name: CC_plot_height
dynamic.label: CalibraCurve plot height
dynamic.desc: Height of CalibraCurve plots in cm. Likely, this has to be increased for multiplots.

dynamic.name: RF_plot_width
dynamic.label: Response factor plot width
dynamic.desc: Width of resonse factor plots in cm.

dynamic.name: RF_plot_height
dynamic.label: Response factor plot height
dynamic.desc: Height of resonse factor plots in cm.

dynamic.name: minReplicates
dynamic.label: Minimum replicates
dynamic.desc: Minimum number of replicates required for a concentration level to be included in the calibration curve.

dynamic.name: cvThres
dynamic.label: CV threshold
dynamic.desc: Threshold for CV per concentration level in percent.

dynamic.name: calcContinuousPrelimRanges
dynamic.label: Calculate Continous Preliminary Ranges?
dynamic.desc: Yes: the longest continuous range is selected. No: gaps with CVs larger than the threshold may be included.

dynamic.name: weightingMethod
dynamic.label: Weighting method
dynamic.desc: Method for weighting (reduces influence of large concentration levels).

dynamic.name: centralTendencyMeasure
dynamic.label: Central Tendency Measure
dynamic.desc: Method for calculating average percent bias.

dynamic.name: perBiasThres
dynamic.label: Percentage bias threshold
dynamic.desc: Threshold for average percent bias in percent.

dynamic.name: considerPerBiasCV
dynamic.label: Consider Percentage Bias CV?
dynamic.desc: If yes, CV is considered for the elimination of the concentration level. CV will only be considered if the difference in   percent bias values is lower than perBiasDistThres.

dynamic.name: perBiasDistThres
dynamic.label: Percentage bias distance threshold
dynamic.desc: Threshold for the difference in average percent bias in percent.

dynamic.name: RfThresL
dynamic.label: Lower RF threshold
dynamic.desc: Lower threshold for response factor in percent.

dynamic.name: RfThresU
dynamic.label: Upper RF threshold
dynamic.desc: Upper threshold for response factor in percent.
